headers.subject: [tosdr:2015] Microsoft.com: [good] Allows you to opt out of targeted advertising

html:
You have a variety of tools to control cookies and similar technologies, including:

  • Browser controls to block and delete cookies;
  • Advertising controls, including Microsoft's controls at http://choice.live.com/advertisementchoice/, to opt out of receiving behaviorally targeted ads; and
  • Controls from some analytics providers to opt out of data collection in web beacons.

 

From <http://www.microsoft.com/privacystatement/en-us/core/default.aspx> 

--
tosdr.org | twitter.com/tosdr | github.com/tosdr

subject: Microsoft.com: [good] Allows you to opt out of targeted advertising
text:
You have a variety of tools to control cookies and similar technologies, 
including:

   - Browser controls to block and delete cookies; 
   - Advertising controls, including Microsoft's controls at 
   http://choice.live.com/advertisementchoice/, to opt out of receiving 
   behaviorally targeted ads; and 
   - Controls from some analytics providers to opt out of data collection 
   in web beacons. 

 

From <http://www.microsoft.com/privacystatement/en-us/core/default.aspx> 

-- 
tosdr.org | twitter.com/tosdr | github.com/tosdr
---
